00061   DWORD uSize = extra.m_data.GetSize();

00069   return m_uHeaderID == extra.m_uHeaderID && m_data.GetSize() == extra.m_data.GetSize() && memcmp(m_data, extra.m_data, m_data.GetSize()) == 0;
